Requirements You are in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.ymyhuyGwv8vEnLIH]{Iai Stance}

You concentrate your energy to deliver a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.D6a4phlAxmixy2lo]{Hakaze} strike fueled by earth-aspected aether. You channel the aether from the ground around you, generating a medium-sized floating boulder in a square in front of you. Until the end of your current turn, your next Hakaze will target the boulder and send it flying in a direction of your choice, to a target within 300 feet of you.

The boulder deals the same number of damage die as your hakaze, but as d12s and deals earth damage (@Damage[(floor((@actor.level - 4)/3) + 2)d12[earth-ff]]). If your attack is a success, the target must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:class|traits:incapacitation] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3} on a critical failure). This effect has the incapacitation trait.
